SETH.raw_line: Yo.I was doing research last night, for next year, and I think I'm gonna go with Bang Bus.The one where they bang the chicks on the bus. Thirteen bucks a month. Maybe I should just pick the one with the least dirty sounding name.I could tell my parents I'm doing a project on Rome and I have to research orgies.Don't touch that!Yeah, you know. I got some other places. Good places. I think we'll be fine.That's disgusting.I am truly, truly jealous that you got to suck on those tits when you were a baby.Fuck it. I'm a senior about to graduate. They should be suckin' my balls. It's the least they can do for stealing three years of my life.Oh, yeah dude, I forgot to tell you. I knocked the fuckin' shit out of him in capture the flag last week.They're like baby toes.Sometimes I get boners so big I can't hide them. And then I get nervous and my heart starts pounding, and it all just, like, feeds my boner. It just becomes this...thing...that's attached to me. And it won't go away.You know it's been, like, a year and a half since I've seen an actual human female nipple. Besides my mom's. I saw it last month, and it was sick.Exactly. Too hot. That's what sucks.And three quarters of a blowjob, But that was fuckin' it. It was the peak of my ass- gettin' career, and it happened way, way, way too early.Exactly! If I'd built up to it, I'd probably at least be having steady sex with a mediocre-looking girl at this point. I honestly now see why Orson Welles ate his fat ass to death.But the key is to be good at sex by the time you're in college. You don't want girls to think you suck dick at fucking.Are you joking, man? Let's see here...she dated Dan Remick, Matt Muir, Josh Corber and what's-his-face. All of those were cool guys. She's been hot way longer than you think. Why would she end her high school career with me?Yeah, and he was a complete fucking loser. You're a step up from that. Which is why you should stop being a pussy and do her! You could nailthe shit out of her for, like, two months before you leave. That bitch looks like a good fucker.What, you can talk about that bitch all day every single day, but I can't say one thing about her?I didn't insult her! I said she looks like a good fucker! She looks like she can take a dick. That's a good thing. Some women pride themselves on their dick- taking abilities.No.I bitched out? You bitched out! You were across the street before I even realized what was going on. That guy's such a douche bag.This...is...bullshit.Mrs. Grier, I joined this class because I thought I'd be cooking with a partner. It's not fair. She's never here. I don't get twice the marks for doing all the work.Look at Evan.While I'm over in my unit, isolated and alone, eating my terrible-tasting food because I can't even properly mix ingredients by myself, I gotta look over at that.I wash and dry. And that is B.S. I'm like a single mother.Jules?That's kind of a personal question.Nothing. It was my attempt at humour.Well, I would call that a success. Marscampone... scamponee cheese? Is that some kind of new cheese or something?Except blue cheese. That stuff is sick.Well whoever "they" are, they can eat my dick.I don't know, probably nothing. Why?Yeah. Sure. That sounds fun. I love parties.Oh, uh. It's more of, like, a love-hate thing. Right now I love them, though. Uh...how do I do this?Dude! She's havin' a fuckin' party.Don't tell Fogell about the party.Like you'd know what to do with it.Yeah, well I'll be at Junior college where the girls are half as smart, and thus twice as likely to blow me.Nothing. Sorry. You'll just have to fingerbang yourself.Dude! That's perfect, `cause, Evan, didn't you just say that you heard about a party?Shut up. Who cares? Just be happy he told. And hey! Now you can buy the booze.Did you tell that nimrod you're not going to room with him?You better, man. That guy is a poon-tang repellent.We're getting a fake ID.Nothing! Jesus.We're not, like, dependent on each other.I would do terrible things to get with Jules tonight. Terrible things.Ah, Helen's a bitch.Hell no! I hate her.I was never going to tell you this story, because I knew that if you heard it you would never want to get with Helen, but over the last few weeks I've been having a hard time thinking of a reason not to. So, here it is. Helen and I went to elementary school together, right? Well, in the third grade, I had...like...an odd problem. For some reason, I don't know why, I used to have this thing...where I would...like, kinda...sit around all day and draw pictures of dicks.I'd just sit there for hours on end drawing dicks. I don't know what it was. I couldn't touch the pen to paper without it drawing a penis.No shit that's fucked up. Here I am this little kid who can't stop drawing dicks to save his life.Just listen.I was very secretive about this dick thing I had going, after all, even I thought I was a loon, lord knows what other people would have thought. She started crying and shit. My parents wouldn't even let me eat dick-shaped foods for, like, months! No carrots, no Pop-sicles, no hot-dogs. You know how many fucking foods are shaped like dick?I can't even stand to look at her punk face. I'm going to go take a piss. Peace.Hey. Here I am.Yeah. Why? Should I not?Very right. Right. I'm getting that.Ummm... I don't know. I... think...maybe.Well, funny thing about my back. It's located on my cock.Ha! Alright, sure. I can do that. What do you guys want?Wow. I would never even think of doing something that nice.Should I just get, like, a shitload of different shit?Yeah! I'll see you!Man, just - Evan, listen to me. You know Jules? You know what she just did? She came up to me and asked me if I would buy her alcohol. Not just her, her whole party. Do you know what that means? It means that by some miracle, we were paired up, we talked, and she actually thought of me afterwards. Thought of me enough to decide that I was the guy that she was going to trust the fun-ness of her party with. She wants me! She fucking wants my dick!Of course I thought of that! LISTEN TO THIS!She has an older brother! She could have asked him, but she asked me! She looked me straight in the face and asked me. She wants to fuck me, man. Do you understand that? Fucking! Today is the day that fucking has become possible.She's going to be at the party, she's gonna be drunk, and she likes me at least a little, so I can get with her. Then, I make her my girlfriend, and then I fuck her all summer long! Then, by the time college rolls around, I'm the fuckin' fucking master, man!Once I've gotten with her, I write her love letters, flowers, I'll do anything - I'll be the most pussy-whipped guy in the universe - what chick wouldn't go out with a guy like that?Fuck off, Greg. Why don't you piss your pants again?Wanna hear the best part?Helen!You do the same thing, man! Buy Helen her alcohol. Then, tonight, when you guys are both drunk, get with her! This is the last party we're ever going to go to as high school people! I've fully ignored my hatred for Helen in coming up with this, which is a big ass deal. We need to stop being pussy and for once just goes balls out, man!Of course! It'll be pimp, and then you know she'll be drunk.You talk to Helen, I'll find that retard Fogell.That douche bag isn't back yet, I've been standing here with my thumb up my ass.Whoa. That is fucking pimp. Why didn't I do that? Shit.That's what we get for trusting a mental midget! He's fucking it all up! I bet he pussied out, just like I said he would!I mean, what are we going to tell the girls? "Sorry, we couldn't do what we promised because we're dickless incompetents!" That's why you picked a bad name.Look at this shit man, you don't even have a first name. It just says "NAME: MCLOVIN"Holy shit! I don't believe this. This says you're fucking 25! Text your brother he's a stupid piece of crap.What the hell is that?You're gonna look like a Pinocchio.You know, they got a ton of liquor right in there. I had such bad acne last year, I became an expert on the stuff.Yeah, but wait...you drove me here, Evan drove me here, how do we-So, uh, I'll call you later.

EVAN.raw_line: What's up?Which one's Bang Bus?That stuff's bullshit, they're all faking it. And plus, your parents are gonna look at the bill.Weapons of Ass Destruction's out then.Yeah. Just tell them your taking a class on blow jobs.Miss each other? No!Fuck you, man.You're being an idiot, man. You really shouldn't park there.What the hell's wrong with Dimitri?Good! 9th Grade Camp he gave me whiplash in "King of the Ring." I fucking hate that guy.Look at those nipples.It's not fair. I have to hide every erection I get.Just imagine if girls weren't weirded out by our boners and they actually wanted to see `em, like this shit.Holy shit. Liat was two years ago? I guess so. She was insanely hot, though.How can that possibly suck? I'd be fuckin' psyched if I'd gotten with a girl that hot. You got, like, two dozen handjobs!You're like Orson Welles.You'll have sex in college. Everyone does. And if not, you'll have the Bang Bus.I still think you've got a chance with Jules. She got mad hot over last summer, and clearly hasn't realized it, `cause she still flirts with you.Well, Helen got with Ariel Shafir.Hey! I'm sick of you talking about her like that, man!I don't constantly insult her.Wow. You really bitched out on that one.Oh, don't worry, no worries. Just keep it. Then you'll just have it, and you won't have to borrow another pen.Yeah, it's a maybe. But, you know, I gotta, I got my...there's so much other fun shit that is going to be going on that night...so, you know...Because of all the other fun shit I'm off doing.Dimitri's? I uh...didn't want to go, because, well, I did other stuff. Saturday... Oh yeah! Saturday night was awesome!First my parents went out to a double feature, so a bunch of people came over......and we had a couple drinks in my basement......and Seth's parents were having this cocktail party, and we went over there to, like, mingle......and there were actually some really interesting and, like, entertaining people there......and, uh, then we saw some, uh, live music....then we went to a club downtown......and then we pretty much called it a night and went home......you would've loved it.Yeah...well, you know, me and Seth are always cooking up...uh...fun little...events.Nah. We were going to but, uh, we got into different ones.Same shit I've always been doing. It'll be fine. Don't worry about it. I'm not.That's good shit. Huh, Miroki?What you doing?Well done, man.
